Name: Bash
Description: Melee daze. Daze your opponent shortly unable to hit. Has a stackable damage per hit

Name: Cleave
Description: Cleave in close radius. Bonus <<Percentage>>% Weapon-Damage done if equipped a slashing weapon

Name: Warrior shout
Description: Reduce physical damage and movement speed of of opponents by <<Percentage>>%

Name: Knockdown
Description: Kick and knockdown the opponent you're currently fighting. While on the ground they take additional<<Percentage>>% DoA damage

Name: Double strike
Description: Do a double dual-wield in quick successsion, deal <<From>>-<<To>> + <<Percentage>>% Weapon-Damage with each hit of those.

Name: Furious charge
Description: Dash quickly towards selected target knocking every non-massive opponent onto the side. Target has their physical damage reduced by <<Percentage>>% for <<Duration>> sec

Name: Rend
Description: In an AoE motion cut lower parts of nearby opponents causing them to bleed massively. (Allies have a <<Percentage>>% lifesteal per hit)

Name: Leap
Description: Leap toward a destination. While airborne you're immune to CC effects. After landing your physical armor is increased <<Percentage>>% for <<Duration>> sec

Name: Shackle
Description: After a brief moment, hurl a chain toward an opponent, if it hits that opponent is now Shackled unable to get far from you. In addition the chain does fire damage over time

Name: Upheaval
Description: Disturb the ground around you causing heated rocks and sand raise up and deal <<From>>-<<To>> + <<Percentage>>% Weapon-Damage damage to targets nearby. Upheaval does <<Percentage>>% more damage to targets knocked down or airborne

Name: Weapon Throw
Description: Hurl an Axe (or if wielding a Spear or Javelin then Javelin/Spear). Javelin/Spear has a bonus of <<Percentage>>% Weapon-Damage damage and <<Percentage%>>% chance to pierce through

Name: Spike Chamber
Description: Dig the ground under you and set up spikes below. In addition to the high damage when they fall down, targets trapped this way are extra vulnerable to DoA and Finishers

Name: Bury
Description: Grab an opponent from melee range, upside down and shove into the ground. Not only they should be harmless for the duration but opponents trapped this way are more <<Percentage>>% vulnerable to DoA and Finishers

Name: Ground smash
Description: Slam a bludgeon weapon on the ground (or foot if not equipped) causing a ripple effecct dazing and damaging opponents nearby. Damage increases by <<Percentage>>% of the Weapon's damage if equipped a bludgeon weapon

Name: Ancient Spear
Description: Harpoon an opponent next to you. For a short period of time after (<<Duration>> sec), they'll take <<Percentage>>% extra damage from physical attacks and finishers

Name: Whirling Strike
Description: Jump in a roundhouse motion wielding 2 weapons and knocking everyone back. Additionally can chain-up a few of these in a moving motion for stacking damage and battle control

Name: Execute
Description: Jump head-high in front of an opponent and swing downward for a 2 hand smash (or slash). If an opponent is below <<Percentage>>% max HP you execute them immediately. (Extra damage done this way doesn't count toward Ultimate refreshing)

Name: Impale
Description: Setup your Javelin/Spear on the ground, take on the nearest opponent and impale it on the sight. The impaled target will take additional damage from CCeffects and Finishers

Name: Overpower
Description: Grab an opponent and throw it on others. If the opponent you carry has more HP than it's target/s they'll all end up both knocked down and vulnerable to DoA and Finishers for <<Duration>> sec

Name: Shield Wall
Description: Create a wall with spiked shileds around your location not allowing anyone escape the area unless using an escape or movement ability type. Targets hit upon those spiked shields take additional <<Percentage>>% physical damage

Name: Wrath of the Berserker
Description: Drink upon the blood of Bul'Kathos rendering you unstoppable and deal extra/stacking damage to your targets/victims for the duration

Name: Call of the Ancients
Description: Call upon the aid of Ancients. They'll know what they'll do to your targets. The good part is they'll also have some [Setup/s and Finisher/s] of their own

Name: Iron Maelstrom
Description: Strap a chain around your weapon and start whirling toward a direction causing multiple knockbacks and stacked damage to opponents nearby. Damage applied and done is increased by <<Percentage>>% of your weapon damage also

Name: Bone Spear
Description: Unbury a huge bone tooth from right underneath and launch it at your opponents for a huge piercing/knockback action. Each kill within <<Duration>> sec recharges your ult/s by <<Duration>> sec

Name: Thunder Bolt
Description: After <<Duration>> seconds a large Thunderbolt from the skies gets casted on the selected location dealing a medium/large damage portion

Name: Arc Lash
Description: Knockback your closest opponent causing it take <<Percentage>>% more damage from the next attack suffered

Name: Frost Bolt
Description: Launch a projectile to slow down and mildly damage opponents (eventually freeze)

Name: Fire Ball
Description: Hurl a fireball that explodes on impact igniting the target location for <<Duration>> sec

Name: Lighgtning Bond
Description: Launch a lightning harpoon toward a nearby opponent. The Harpoon then continues to deal stacking damage per tick (2 ticks/sec) to the target and all opponents caught in middle

Name: Mystic Orb
Description: Place a Mystic Orb on the ground that camouflages itself after a while. When someone moves nearby they jump into air and slow the opponents by <<Percenrage>>% and causing them to take additional <<Percentage>>% spell damage for <<Duration>>% seconds

Name: Flash
Description: Enchant yourself with Lightning and deal <<From>>-<<To>> + <<Percentage>>% Weapon-Damage as lightning to targets nearby

Name: Charged Bolts
Description: Launch Charged Bolts that travel toward a general direction but travel in a random fashion. Sometimes multiple can hit a target

Name: Ice Shards
Description: Launch a blob of Ice bolts in close range, then levitate them to form a floating Barrier reducing damage taken from incoming projectiles by <<Percentage>>% for <<Duration>> sec. If the shards cause a kill, duration is refreshed

Name: Teleport
Description: Teleport a short distance to a target location. Additionally get rid of effects of type DoT/Debuffs possible

Name: Enchant
Description: Whatever weapon you wield, enchant it to deal additional <<From>>-<<To>> damage per hit as fire. Melee kills refresh the duration

Name: Frozen Orb
Description: Hurl an Orb of frost that spins fast and hits other nearby opponents with Frost Bolts. Damage done this way is increased by <<Percentage>>% of damage of FrostBolt

Name: Frost Nova
Description: Briefly launch yourself in air and drop a Frost bomb that Explodes and instantly freezes nearby opponents. While frozen these opponents take additional <<Percentage>>% damage from all sources

Name: Firewall
Description: Summon a firewall that will greatly deal damage to opponents caught. While in the Firewall targets hit with additional fire sources take <<Percentage>>% more

Name: Hydra
Description: Summon a Hydra that shoots fire bolts toward it's nearby targets for <<Duration>> sec. Each 3rd hit on the same target deals <<Percentage>>% more

Name: Chain lightning
Description: Cast a chain lightning that will bounce between opponents during the next <<Duration>> sec. Each new opponent hit takes <<Percentage>>% more damage. Additionally can just enchant your weapon for a Chain-lightning attack, this way the first target suffers a 2*<<Percentage>>% more damage but bounces one less time

Name: Mirror Image
Description: Summon additional Mirror images that will mimic your other non-stackable, non-hard-hitting attacks and deal <<Percentage>>% damage of that of yours. Mirror Images last for <<Duration>> seconds

Name: Archon
Description: Transform into an Archon giving you <<Percentage>>% Resistances and HP bonus. Additionally your basic attack becomes a ranged chain-lightning per hit that deals <<From>>-<<To>> bonus damage

Name: Meteor
Description: Call down upon a Meteor for massive damage on a target location. The damage on Impact is increased by <<Percentage>>% of your per hit fire damage and half of that for the DoT duration.

Name: Conduit
Description: Become a high energized lightning orb zapping everyone nearby for the duration. Additionally when this effect ends your lightning skills deal additional <<Percentage>>%*ConduitTargetsHit damage for <<Duration>>*2 sec

Name: Icy cage
Description: After a small delay summon a cage of Ice and Trap targets inside. While inside this cage, their resistance to Cold and Damage (both ability and per hit) is reduced <<Percentage>>% per tick [2 ticks/sec] for <<Duration>> sec after. Additionally, cold damage sources can heal the cage back preventing it get destroyed before expiration

Name: Tesla Coil
Description: Summon lightning orbs dealing AoE damage over time below them. The coils will also create a smaller field of charges nearby that will empower resistances to Lightning and Blind to allies. (Gains 10% bonus per-tick from the damage per tick of Lightning Bond)

Name: Astral Barrier
Description: Summon a barrier of multiple lightning orbs orbitting around neutralizing incoming projectiles or zap opponents that come up too close. Each of these orbs has only 1 charge and discharge quickly. After discharging they randomly either proc Thunder Bolt or materialize and drop in a form of a Mystic Orb right below

Name: Earthspike
Description: After a brief period summon an Earth spike damaging opponent standing above or rise up in form of a terrain obstacle

Name: Sandstorm
Description: Whirl some dune sands around the Druid and deal stackable damage to nearby opponents. This effect renders the Druid take reduced damage from spell attacks and Opponents more vulnerable to spell damage (by <<Percentage>>%) for <<Duration>> sec

Name: Shred
Description: Turn into Werewolf and shred opponent hit. This effect does additional <<Percentage>>% damage per companion

Name: Fissure
Description: After a brief moment summon a rupture on the ground originating from you toward your intended target. The fissure damages all opponents hit and stuns them for <<Duration>> sec

Name: Maul
Description: Turn into Werebear form and maul target for a greater amount of damage. Successful Maul executions also increase your Armor by <<Percentage>>% for <<Duration>> sec

Name: Wolf Companion
Description: Summon a wolf companion that will aid you in combat. Each of these increases your damage in Werewolf or Buff duration in Werebear form for <<Percentage>>%

Name: Cyclone
Description: Summon a local breeze that turns into a cyclone upon hitting a target causing it to levitate airborne. While airborne target is vulnerable taking <<Percentage>>% more damage from Projectiles and Finishers

Name: Pulverize
Description: Turn into a werebear and slam the ground damaging and knocking nearby targets down. While vulnerable like this your companions and Finisher effects deal <<Percentage>>% damage more

Name: Falling rocks
Description: Summon a greater pillar with rocks falling over in predetermined direction. Each new rock hitting same target does <<Percentage>>% more damage than the previous. Casting this ability in Werewolf or Werebear form just sets 2 rocks instead of the intended 5 though

Name: Fungal growth
Description: Briefly entangle an opponent that will take a mild damage and some consumables will drop. This effect stops 1 second after the target gets hit by another damage source

Name: Treant log
Description: Summon a dry treant (log) intercepting and preventing incoming projectile damage. This log can be lit on fire and deal <<Percentage>> of it's HP/sec damage to opponents nearby. (This ability lasts twice shorter and has double the CD when not in human form)

Name: Arctic Blast
Description: Start a whirling cone of cold air cooling at very rapid rate, damaging, slowing down, and freezing opponents nearby at a rapid rate.

Name: Boulder
Description: Hurl a boulder on opponents repeatedly and greatly damaging them and knocking them back

Name: Trample
Description: Turn into a werebear and trample over nearby opponents damaging and knocking them back. Trampled targets will have <<Percentage>>% movement and damage reduced for <<Duration>> sec

Name: Roar
Description: While in Werewolf or Werebear form use this to temporarily reduce Armorof and life-return to all targets affected nearby for <<Duration>>% seconds. Affected opponents of type Summoner are also not going to use summon during this period

Name: Molten lava
Description: Summon molten river doing damage in a linear progression. Additionally, any Rock-related abilities that interract with the lava will deal <<Percentage>>% damage more

Name: Eclypse
Description: Cast this while in werewolf or Werebear form to increase your chance and hit damage of CriticalHits by <<Percentage>>%. This bonus is additionally increased for every Companion alive

Name: Ancestral link
Description: Summon a totem that reduces damage taken (by <<Percentage>>% and links/splits it between you and your companions. Anyone who didn't get hit for the duration will also enjoy a <<Percentage>>% increase in Regeneration for another <<Duration>> sec.

Name: Rabies
Description: Greatly increase your damage in Werewolf/Werebear form by adding up additional stacking poison. This bonus gets increased by <<Percentage>>% of current poison-per-hit amount. Successful kills like this reset the effect's duration

Name: Earthen Bulwark
Description: Surround yourself with Rocks for protection. Each hit that the rocks absorb will increase your armor by <<Percentage>>% during the duration and for <<Duration>> seconds after

Name: Bear companion
Description: Summon a greater bear that Deals <<From>>-<<To>> + <<Percentage>>% Weapon-Damage has 300+(<<Percentage>>% your MaxHP) as health to fight on your side. While she is alive, your Werewolf/Werebear Finishers also deal <<Percentage>>% more. She also replenishes life back much quicker (<<Percentage>>% of damage done per hit) while in Human form

Name: Cataclysm
Description: Call down upon the wrath of the skies. Massive storm and hurricanes will cover all over the place in a larger area for <<Duration>> seconds

Name: Wildlife mutation
Description: Call upon the wrath of mother nature. Increase the life and life return effects by <<Percentage>>% of the Druid and all of it's summons for <<Duration>>

Name: Wolf Raid
Description: Order your wolves to attack a single target. If during the initial period of <<Duration>> sec none of them dies and target loses 25% max HP then the wolves also bite the target and hold it for that much longer. (Wolf Raid does <<PercentagE>>% additional damage in Human form)
